response.overview: Andrzej and Teresa live in Sweden. They come from Poland and work black with what work they can get hold of. They live Spartan in a rental room that they must not disclose where it is located. They want to start a new life in Sweden but do not have a contract for a white job and therefore no Social Security numbers. In the film we follow Andrzej and Teresa on their way between different Swedish authorities in the fight for a Social Security number and the last four numbers. At the same time, they meet Jacek, who has lived and worked black in Sweden for 8 years. He lives alone in a basement. He is stuck in the black job and dreams of getting the power to change his situation.
response.title: Det dolda landet
